name: Beer Run 2
description:
The long-awaited sequel to the game that revolutionized the indie game scene.

Updated GFXXX. Smokier cigs. Greedier canvassers. More belligerent bros. And a new rival awaits at the gates of the Beer Store.

Note: If Firefox or Chrome don't work; please try Edge.

Controls:

WASD: Move.

Q: Smoke a cig to drive others away.

E: Donate a dollar to placate a canvasser.

Left Shift: Drink an energy drink to get a speed boost!
